invoice.h

 
  #pragma once
  
  #include "click.h"
  #include "middleware.h"
  
  using namespace json11;
  using namespace click::enhance::dataManagement;
  
  namespace click {
  
    typedef shared_ptr<Plustache::Context> CONTEXT;
    typedef durian::generator<durian::XmlElement::Body> XMLBODY;
    typedef PlustacheTypes::CollectionType COLLECTION;
    typedef PlustacheTypes::ObjectType MAP;
  
    namespace integration {
      namespace dcm {
  
        template<typename T>
        class invoice : public middleware::handler < click::client<T> > {
          typedef click::client<T>* CLIENT;

some:dcm:action:update is the only action type this middleware will act on!

 
          const string ACTION_TYPE = "integration:dcm:invoice:create:ifnotexist:update";
        public:
Params
clickClient click::client client specific to this middleware
j json11::Json json document
Returns
click::client same client passed in 
          click::client<T>& sync(click::client<T>& clickClient, Json j) override {

If you're not interested in this action, return immediately!

 
            if (j["action"].is_null() || j["action"].string_value() != ACTION_TYPE) {
              return clickClient;
            }
            string newId = j["id"].string_value();
            string billingPeriod = j["billingPeriod"].string_value();
            string startDate = j["startDate"].string_value();
            string endDate = j["endDate"].string_value();
            string forIACUCProtocol = j["forIACUCProtocol"].string_value();
            string forProject = j["forProject"].string_value();

use userId to match the data context

 
            string principalInvestigator = j["pi"].string_value();
            string resourceContainer = j["resourceContainer"].string_value();
            string resourceContainerParent = j["resourceContainerParent"].string_value();
            string resourceContainerParent_str = "com.webridge.entity.Entity[OID[" + resourceContainerParent + "]]";
            vector<Element::Attribute> vec{
              { "ID", "String", "", "ID", newId },
              { "Billing Period", "_AnimalCensus", "EntityType", "ID", billingPeriod },
              { "Billing Period Start Date", "Date", "", "", startDate },
              { "Billing Period End Date", "Date", "", "", endDate },
              { "For IACUC Protocol", "_IACUC Study", "EntityType", "", forIACUCProtocol },
              { "For Project", "Project", "EntityType", "ID", forIACUCProtocol },
              { "Principal Investigator", "Person", "EntityType", "userId", principalInvestigator },
              { "resourceContainer", "ResourceContainer", "EntityType", "Poref", "" },
              { "resourceContainer.template", "ContainerTemplate", "EntityType", "ID", "TMPL50F5759DF0000" },
              { "resourceContainer.parent", "ContainerBase", "EntityType", "Poref", resourceContainerParent_str },

Leave ID blank, SOAP service will create ESET for us

 
              { "Charge Items", "_ChargeItem", "SetType", "ID", "" },
              { "company", "Company", "EntityType", "ID", "Click Commerce" }
            };
            vector<string> attributes;
            std::for_each(vec.begin(), vec.end(), [&](Element::Attribute& attr){
              string el = clickClient.dataManagementHelper.createElement(attr);
              attributes.push_back(std::move(el));
            });

Wrap the attributes inside of a WebService block

 
            Element::WebService webService{ "Invoice", "ID", newId, "_Invoice", attributes };
            string updateMemberBody = clickClient.dataManagementHelper.createElement(webService);

Send it off with the client

 
            clickClient.InvokeDataManagement("Add", updateMemberBody);

Don't forget to clearContext for the next middleware!

 
            clickClient.clearContext(clickClient.additionalWhitelist);

Don't forget to return the clickClient object!

 
            return clickClient;
          }
        };
      }
    }
  }
